message: Let's start fair and split the money evenly. What do you say?
Your offer was fair, but inflation is working against me.  I need a bit more to make it worthwhile. How about this split?
I understand inflation is affecting you, but I'm not willing to give up more than I already have. Let's split it 60/40 this time. If we can't agree, I'll take my chances with the next round.
